verses.verse: [This is] the message <WH1697> which <WH834> Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> spoke <WH1696> to Baruch <WH1263> the son <WH1121> of Neriah, <WH5374> when he had written <WH3789> down <WH3789> these <WH428> words <WH1697> in a book <WH5612> at Jeremiah's dictation, <WH6310> in the fourth <WH7243> year <WH8141> of Jehoiakim <WH3079> the son <WH1121> of Josiah, <WH2977> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> saying: <WH559>
"Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> to you, O Baruch: <WH1263>

'You said, <WH559> "Ah, woe <WH188> is me! For the Lord <WH3068> has added <WH3254> sorrow <WH3015> to my pain; <WH4341> I am weary <WH3021> with my groaning <WH603> and have found <WH4672> no <WH3808> rest. <WH4496>"'

"Thus <WH3541> you are to say <WH559> to him, 'Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord, <WH3068> "Behold, <WH2009> what <WH834> I have built <WH1129> I am about to tear <WH2040> down, <WH2040> and what <WH834> I have planted <WH5193> I am about to uproot, <WH5428> that is, the whole <WH3605> land. <WH776> "

'But you, are you seeking <WH1245> great <WH1419> things <WH1419> for yourself? Do not seek <WH1245> [them;] for behold, <WH2009> I am going to bring <WH935> disaster <WH9567> on all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320>' declares <WH5002> the Lord, <WH3068> 'but I will give <WH5414> your life <WH5315> to you as booty <WH7998> in all <WH3605> the places <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> you may go. <WH1980>' "
